item.description:
The Great Escape and Flesh will be performing at The Hudson Portuguese Club the night after Thanksgiving, Friday, November 27!
This is going to be a memorable night and we're excited to have Flesh performing - check them out at http://www.myspace.co... - Great Band!

When we played at the Portuguese Club last March it sold out very quickly - don't miss out! Doors open at 8:00.

For information and to purchase tickets you may contact:
luisa-fontes@hotmail.com
derek.a.chaves@gmail.com
functions@hudsonportugueseclub.org
journeycoverband@gmail.com

Or call 978-567-1929 / 978-568-0561

Hope to see you there.
Kerry
item.name: The Great Escape Journey Band
